record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3098
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3098 -- (Senate - June 06, 2008)

[Page: S5375]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 3098 introduced earlier today by Senator McConnell is at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 3098) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend certain expiring provisions, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I ask for its second reading and object to my own request.

record.chair: The bill will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The assistant legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
